title: Reimagining the future of tech protection from Dallas - Dallas Business Journal - The Business Journals
content: Reimagining the future of tech protection from Dallas - Dallas Business Journal  The Business Journals
description: One survey estimated as many as 70 million phones are lost in the U.S. every year and typically only 7% are ever recovered. These are frightening statistics especially for most of us, as our mobile phone is a lifeline. We need a safety net to protect and restore our technology.
